photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course containing modules and lessons.

description.description: A brief description of the course.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of the course thumbnail image.

isFeatured.description: Indicates if the course is featured.

Module.title: Module
Module.description: Represents a module within a course.

order.description: The order of the module within the course.

Lesson.title: Lesson
Lesson.description: Represents a lesson (video) within a module.

description.description: A short description of the lesson.

videoUrl.description: URL of the lesson video file in Firebase Storage.

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

order.description: The order of the lesson within the module.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/courses/{courseId}/modules/{moduleId}.description: Stores modules for a specific course.

/courses/{courseId}/modules/{moduleId}/l.description: Stores lessons for a specific module.
